name: pnp-list-teams-owners-and-members
title: CLI - List all Microsoft Teams team's Owners and Members
shortDescription: This script allows you to list all Teams team's owners and members and export them into a CSV file.
longDescription: This script allows you to list all Teams team's owners and members and export them into a CSV file.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
